summary: "Captain America: Civil War" is a 2016 superhero movie about Captain America, made by Marvel Studios. It's the third Captain America film, following a disagreement among the Avengers about who should control them. This leads to a split, with Captain America and Iron Man leading opposing teams. The movie, directed by the Russo brothers, stars Chris Evans and Robert Downey Jr. It's based on the comic book storyline "Civil War" and was a big hit, earning over $1.1 billion. A new Captain America film, "Brave New World," is coming in 2025.
title: Captain America Civil War
